message: Mr. Montoya knows the way to the bakery even though he's never been there.

author: Fintan Carrillo
message: You've been eyeing me all day and waiting for your move like a lion stalking a gazelle in a savannah.

author: Stanley Hartley
message: Peanuts don't grow on trees, but cashews do.
He was sure the Devil created red sparkly glitter.
The bird had a belief that it was really a groundhog.

author: Jana Edwards
message: The paper airplane unionized and demanded better working conditions in classrooms.
Found a way to turn procrastination into a sport. The championship is perpetually delayed.

author: Lois Bernard
message: Invented a new sport called extreme spooning. It involves intense cuddling and oversized utensils.
Invented a game called "Hide and Seek with My Keys." Spoiler: The keys always win.
Launched a podcast about the existential thoughts of houseplants. It's called "The Philosophical Fern."

author: Alina Baird
message: Launched a social media campaign to bring back pet rocks. #RockSolidFriends
He strives to keep the best lawn in the neighborhood.

author: Cira Villarrubia
message: The gloves protect my feet from excess work.
He dreamed of eating green apples with worms.

author: Xian Liang
message: The three-year-old girl ran down the beach as the kite flew behind her.
Her scream silenced the rowdy teenagers.
The superhero broccoli fought against the evil candy corn, promoting a balanced diet.

author: Lakshmi Vyas
message: My uncle's favorite pastime was building cars out of noodles.
The jellybean orchestra played a sweet symphony that attracted a swarm of candy-loving bees.
The jellybean became a motivational speaker, encouraging others to embrace their inner sweetness.
I am never at home on Sundays.
The llama couldn't resist trying the lemonade.
It took him a month to finish the meal.
The pencil sharpener claimed it had a black belt in martial arts and challenged the eraser to a duel.

author: Tomas Bradford
message: The rubber chicken started a dance craze called the "Chicken Cha-Cha," taking barnyards by storm.
Started a petition to add a coffee IV drip to the office supplies list. Productivity levels would skyrocket!
When motorists sped in and out of traffic, all she could think of was those in need of a transplant.
Decided to become a professional blanket burrito roller. It's a cozy career.
There were three sphered rocks congregating in a cubed room.

author: Melody Cabrera
message: Taught my dog how to fetch the newspaper, but it came back as a paper-mâché sculpture. Close enough.
Invented a game called "The Great Sock Migration." Socks travel in pairs, seeking warmer climates.
Launched a YouTube channel dedicated to reviewing invisible gadgets. Spoiler: They're all cutting-edge.

author: Sumaya Stokes
message: You can't compare apples and oranges, but what about bananas and plantains?
You're good at English when you know the difference between a man eating chicken and a man-eating chicken.
Invented a game called "Extreme Tic-Tac-Toe." Spoiler: It's still a tie.
The ninja chicken practiced stealth by hiding in a carton of eggs.
He wondered if it could be called a beach if there was no sand.
Decided to become a professional blanket fort architect. My skills are tent-atively improving.

author: Kyron Miller
message: I had a friend in high school named Rick Shaw, but he was fairly useless as a mode of transport.
The tortoise jumped into the lake with dreams of becoming a sea turtle.

author: Madina Pedregon
message: 8. Started a book club for people who never finish the books but still want to discuss them. Spoiler alert: We never discuss the endings.

author: Bartosz Morton
message: Launched a campaign to replace all doorbells with personalized jingles. Ding-dong, sing along!

author: Louie Fry
message: Invented a game called "The Silent Sing-Along." Lips move, but no sound comes out.

author: Filipa Cerrato
message: Had a conversation with my GPS about the meaning of life. It recalculated.

author: Marco Turner
message: Found a way to turn ordinary socks into sock puppets. Sock puppet theater, here I come!
The conspiracy theory among garden gnomes is that flamingos are actually undercover spies.

author: Zackary Miranda
message: Joyce enjoyed eating pancakes with ketchup.
They improved dramatically once the lead singer left.
The ping pong ball attempted to break the world record for the longest bounce, but it got tired after the third bounce.

author: Pundarik Samuel
message: The pancake stack challenged the waffle tower to a breakfast brawl in the kitchen.
He spiked his hair green to support his iguana.
A group of sneezing dolphins organized a bubblegum-blowing competition underwater.

author: Eskame Fernando
message: I accidentally watered my plants with fruit punch, and now they're growing fruit salad.
The rubber ducky organized a synchronized swimming competition for bath toys.
Launched a petition to add "Nap Time" to the official work schedule. Productivity would skyrocket, obviously.
She had a difficult time owning up to her own crazy self.
The invisible snail won the race by leaving a trail of glitter behind.
The ice cream cone went on a quest to find the legendary cherry on top of the sundae mountain.

author: Jonathan Johnston
message: Attempted to break the record for the longest time spent balancing a spoon on my nose while reciting Shakespeare. Alas, poor Yorick!
Attempted to break the world record for the longest time spent balancing a spoon on my nose. Current record holder: My cat.

author: Alysha Gray
message: Pat ordered a ghost pepper pie.
The superhero toaster shoots butter beams to rescue dry toast in distress.
The pancake declared itself the king of breakfast and demanded a syrup tax from waffles.

author: Paciencia Santoyo
message: Started a campaign to make pajamas acceptable office attire. Productivity might skyrocket!

author: Tabitha Marsh
message: Launched a YouTube channel dedicated to reviewing invisible products. Spoiler: They're all top-notch.
